Trade/Device Name(s): AutoSure Voice II Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AutoSure Voice II Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AutoSure Voice II and AutoSure Voice II Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, or palm; AutoSure Voice II for single-patient home use, AutoSure Voice II Pro for multiple-patient professional use; includes voice functionality for visually impaired users; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
